requirement_text: Provide integrated CCTV, Access Control and Intruder solution compliant with relevant British Standards
answer_text: We will deliver an integrated CCTV/ACS/Intruder solution with standards-led design, commissioning and documentation.

requirement_text: Commissioning & handover deliverables: SAT, training, as-fitted drawings, asset registers, config backups, O&M manuals
answer_text: Commissioning includes SAT, training, and full handover pack (as-fitted, asset register, backups, O&M).

requirement_text: Maintenance & support: planned maintenance (min 2 visits p.a.) + reactive maintenance + emergency call-out
answer_text: Planned maintenance (min 2 visits p.a.) plus reactive and emergency call-out capability.

requirement_text: Data protection & information security (UK GDPR, DPA 2018, ISO 27001 or equivalent, secure evidence handling, chain of custody)
answer_text: YES – UK GDPR/DPA controls, secure evidence handling and audit trails; InfoSec evidence referenced.

requirement_text: H&S and environmental controls (policy, RAMS, waste handling, carbon reduction)
answer_text: H&S policy + RAMS process; environmental controls incl. waste/WEEE and carbon reduction initiatives.

requirement_text: Tender submission requirements: completed response doc, pricing schedule, policies/certs, evidence of experience, minimum 3 case studies, conflicts declaration
answer_text: Partially provided – response, supporting artefacts, evidence register and example case studies included; pricing remains a template; conflicts declaration requires signed Trust form.

requirement_text: Design & Build including surveys, removal/disposal, temp security, install, integration, commissioning, training, maintenance
answer_text: YES – included with explicit continuity strategy and phased delivery.

requirement_text: Network constraints: VLAN segregation, no internet exposure, compliance with Authority cyber policy, explicit network assumptions
answer_text: YES – VLAN segregation and no internet exposure confirmed; assumptions logged.

requirement_text: CCTV quantities/retention/analytics/evidential export; maintain coverage during replacement
answer_text: YES – site-based quantities per RFP categories; 45-day retention; continuity strategy.

requirement_text: Access Control door schedule (critical; disqualification risk if missing)
answer_text: Door schedule template included; RFP does not include door-by-door data to complete it at tender stage.

requirement_text: Intruder: Grade 2/3 per site; dual-path; zoning/partitioning; integration with CCTV triggers
answer_text: YES – detection types, zoning/partitioning, dual-path and CCTV integration logic included.

requirement_text: Data protection & cyber: DPIA, encryption, 24h incident notification, right of audit
answer_text: YES – DPIA support, encryption approach, 24h notification and auditability confirmed.

requirement_text: Pricing fixed; no post-award increases; breakdown by site and system
answer_text: Partially – pricing structure and templates provided; sell values require completion.

requirement_text: Submission artefacts: compliance matrix, equipment schedules, network diagrams, RAMS, risk register, programme, assumptions/deviations logs, pricing schedules, social value
answer_text: YES – all artefacts included in PDF pack.
Evidence register references bid library; confirm attachments uploaded with submission.
